meanings.definition: To feel a sudden wave of excitement or pleasure.
meanings.sent1: I was thrilled to see my favorite band perform live.
meanings.sent2: She always feels thrilled when she visits the amusement park.
meanings.sent3: The puppy was thrilled to chase its tail around in circles.
meanings.sent4: The children were thrilled as if they had found a hidden treasure in the backyard.
meanings.sent5: The colorful fireworks display thrilled the entire crowd with its beauty.

meanings.definition: To cause someone to feel a sudden wave of excitement or pleasure.
meanings.sent1: The surprise party thrilled her beyond words.
meanings.sent2: The news of the promotion thrilled the employees at the office.
meanings.sent3: The magician thrilled the audience with his amazing tricks.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected gift thrilled him like a bolt of lightning.
meanings.sent5: The thrilling roller coaster ride left everyone screaming with joy.
